Queries.CreateUserTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS User (UserId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, FirstName TEXT NOT NULL, LastName TEXT NOT NULL, Email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, PasswordHash TEXT NOT NULL, DateOfBirth TEXT NOT NULL, PhoneNumber TEXT);
Queries.InsertTestUser: INSERT INTO User (FirstName, LastName, Email, PasswordHash, DateOfBirth, PhoneNumber) VALUES ($firstName, $lastName, $email, $passwordHash, $dateOfBirth, $phoneNumber);
Queries.CheckUserTable: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name='User';
Queries.SelectExpenses: SELECT CategoryId, SUM(Amount) AS TotalAmount FROM 'Transaction' WHERE UserId = @UserId GROUP BY CategoryId
